Title: The Trash and the Snake
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Chris Provenzano, Ingrid Escajeda, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Jere Burns, Joelle Carter
Plot: Raylan and Boyd separately find out why Avery Markham is buying up all the land in Harlan, as well as the consequences if you don't cooperate. Meanwhile, Katherine Hale pays an unexpected visit to Ava.
